iem.title: [B]Selecciona una lista[/B]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['BlackGhost', 'BlackGhost IZZI', 'ExabyteTV', 'TecnoTV', 'G67', 'Sr.RegioTV', 'PremierTV', 'GSat Latino', 'ChileIPTV']) lists = ['https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/tecno.m3u', 'https://pastebin.com/raw/cyH7vTu8', 'http://exabytetv.info/lista.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/lista.m3u', 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/G67/G/master/G67C.m3u', 'http://srregio.net/regiotv.m3u', 'http://www.premieriptv.cl/freeiptv.m3u', 'http://www.geantsat.com/freeiptv/s9.m3u', 'http://chileiptv.cl/cl.m3u'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['opcion Lista ', 'opcion Peliculas', 'opcion Alterna', 'opcion Espana, 'opcion FTA']) lists = ['http://tecnotv.xyz/lista.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/peliculas.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/alterna.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/esp.m3u', 'http://tecnotv.xyz/fta.m3u'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['RegioFlix', 'RegioTV', 'smartTV', 'Deportes', 'LigaMX', 'Alterna']) lists = ['http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/regioflix.m3u', 'http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/regiotv.m3u', 'http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/smartv.m3u', 'http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/deportes.m3u', 'http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/ligamx.m3u', 'http://srregio.xyz/IPTV/alterna.m3u'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Seleciona una Lista ', ['Lista SeriesIPTV', 'Lista Cineflixx', 'Lista Pelis-TV-Depor', 'Lista 340IPTVLatin', 'Lista DeportesYmas', 'Lista PELISyTV', 'Lista seriesytv', 'Lista canalesIPTV440', 'ListaTVyPeliss', 'Lista PelisyTV700', 'Lista tvypelism3u', 'Lista 358IPTV-vip', 'Lista ultimaspelis', 'Lista Pelis-TV-Depor', 'Lista 358IPTV-vip']) lists = ['http://bit.ly/SeriesIPTV', 'http://bit.ly/Cineflixx', 'http://bit.ly/Pelis-TV-Depor', 'http://bit.ly/340IPTVLatin', 'http://bit.ly/DeportesYmas', 'http://bit.ly/PELISyTV', 'http://bit.ly/seriesytv', 'http://bit.ly/canalesIPTV440', 'http://bit.ly/TVyPeliss', 'http://bit.ly/PelisyTV700', 'http://bit.ly/tvypelism3u', 'http://bit.ly/358IPTV-vip', 'http://bit.ly/ultimaspelis', 'http://bit.ly/Pelis-TV-Depor', 'http://bit.ly/358IPTV-vip'] return lists[ret]

iem.item:
• [B]TotalPlay[/B] [ Opcion [B]nibbletv[/B] ][B] [/B] NA2 $doregex[getm3u8]$$TSDOWNLOADER$$
getm3u8 $pyFunction:'$doregex[m3u8]'.decode("hex")
m3u8 NibbleTVdecode\(\"TV(.*?)\" https://www.nibbletv.info/Lista-Gratis
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/tp.jpg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/fanart.jpg

• [B]TotalPlay[/B] [ Opcion [B]nibblepelis[/B] ][B] [/B] NA2 $doregex[getm3u8]
getm3u8 $pyFunction:'$doregex[m3u8]'.decode("hex")
m3u8 listapelis.*?NibbleTVdecode\(\"TV(.*?)\" https://www.nibbletv.info/Lista-Gratis
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/tp.jpg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/fanart.jpg

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[makelist.param3] ahora:[makelist.param4]</title> <link>$doregex[getUrl]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 5_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3&Referer=http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</link> <info>[makelist.param5]</info> <regex> <name>getUrl</name> <expres>source src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>[makelist.param1]</page> <referer>http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</referer> <agent>Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 5_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3</agent> <origin>http://tvplayerlatino.com/envivo/</origin> </regex> <thumbnail>[makelist.param2]</thumbnail> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/tp.jpg</thumbnail> <fanart>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/img/fanart.jpg</fanart>

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import re, requests, HTMLParser def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0'} sn = 1 data = []
while sn <= 4: site1 = 'http://S1' site2 = 'http://S2blabla' site3 = 'http://Sthree' site4 = 'http://SCUATRO' site= HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site1 + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site2+ HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site3+ HTMLParser.HTMLParser().site4 source = requests.get(site+ str(sn), headers=headers).text data += re.findall('a href="(http:\/\/.*?.mp4)" title="(.*?)"', source) sn += 1 return data

regex.name: data
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re, requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0'} sn = 1 data = [] site = 'http://S1', 'http://S2blabla', 'http://Sthree', 'http://SCUATRO' while sn <= 4: source = requests.get(site[sn-1], headers=headers).text data += re.findall('a href="(http:\/\/.*?.mp4)" title="(.*?)"', source) sn += 1 return data

regex.name: makelist
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPad; CPU OS 5_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/534.46 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.1 Mobile/9B176 Safari/7534.48.3

regex.name: test
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,): import time, requests, re, HTMLParser from bisect import bisect_left time = time.strftime("%Y%m%d%H%M%S", time.gmtime()) try: epg = 'http://media.entutele.com/epg/feed.xml' source = requests.get(epg).text # ch = 'TF1' ch = '[makelist.param1]' # ch = 'CANAL\+' # ch = 'France 3 Corse Via Stella' # ch = 'Franceinfo' regex = 'start="(\d+?) .+?channel="' + ch start = re.findall(regex, source) pos = (bisect_left(start, time)) t1 = start[pos] t2 = start[pos + 1] regex = 'start="' + t1 + '.+?channel="' + ch + '">[\\n\\r]*.+?title lang="es">(.+?)<' now = re.findall(regex, source)[0] regex = 'start="' + t2 + '.+?channel="' + ch + '">[\\n\\r]*.+?title lang="es">(.+?)<' next = re.findall(regex, source)[0] except: return ' No program data' return ' [B]Ahora: ' + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().unescape(now) + '\n[/B] Despues: ' + HTMLParser.HTMLParser().unescape(next)
